survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from visitors about their experience at the local community farmers market to improve services and offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the community farmers market?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the community farmers market?

questions.question_text: What types of products do you typically purchase at the farmers market? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an optional text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What types of products do you typically purchase at the farmers market? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of products at the farmers market?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice responses. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall quality of products at the farmers market?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the farmers market?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to capture detailed feedback. Prompt respondents to be specific.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the farmers market?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the community farmers market to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include a neutral option if needed.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the community farmers market to others?
